channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]VPS and Web Hosting Section
channel.description: I think it would be great to add a vps and web hosting section for members to sell cheap or offer free webhosting/vps for people who want to start rsps servers

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]VPS and Web Hosting Section
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

I tried to get this awhile back aswell and they said it will never happen, and if you go to rune-server its everyone claiming they purchase their crap from a Datacenter when they are clearly 15 year old kids that don’t even have the money to fork out 500+ dollars to pay for servers from a datacenter.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]VPS and Web Hosting Section
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I doubt the web hosting will ever occur due to our rules. As far as a vps section there aren’t enough questions concerning the topic to really warrant one imo.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]VPS and Web Hosting Section
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

there’s hundreds of decent free webhosting services out there, both on and off shore.
we don’t need to add sections for players to potentially scam, when there’s no guarantee their servers will remain up after x amount of days, or even remain active for the purchaser.

i could easily buy a server and run apache and sql/php daemons and sell cheap web hosting to person_a, wait for a new person to attempt to purchase, and remove all person_a’s data, and sell to person_b and so on.

as for vps; https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474981.0.html
that topic helps enough.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]VPS and Web Hosting Section
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well the board will DEFIANTLY not be added for the selling of cheap webhosting and/or VPS services considering purchasing and selling is against the rules as it is. And I don’t agree with adding a board at all because the general questions has been for such things for a long time now, no sense of having a board that may not have enough activity.

Read full topic
